Recently, an unconscious action that could
cause a forest fire was discovered in Lai Chau,
causing public outrage. A group of tourists
carelessly set off fireworks to celebrate their
birthday right under the protection forest today.
District police  Tam Duong
officially informed about the
incident, according to which on March 16, a group
of 22 tourists climbed from Ta Len commune
to the top of Put Len mountain to watch the Quyen dump,
they hired three people to pack their gear and guide the way when
resting.  In the middle of the forest on the night of the same
day this group celebrated a
member's birthday and set off firecrackers, a light
was shot up to a height of about 10 m. A
person in another climbing group spoke up to
stop it but was not upset, so
recorded a video and posted it to a
mountain climbing enthusiast group. On the afternoon of March 177,
this group left Lai Chau province.
Arson in the dry season protection forest

situation in Long An province. Currently, most

a lot of
money. Long An General Hospital has

But we don't have the machines to run them, so we have to transfer

Tien Giang province for dialysis.
There
are not enough machines so he contacted Tam
20. There is a doctor willing to give something. The
whole province currently only has about 150 machines
operating continuously to meet the needs of 415
patients, while about 320 patients need
dialysis.  Outside the province, the province has
planned to equip 160 more machines, including 100
hundred machines this year and 60 machines next year
with the hope that in the near future, dialysis costs will
no longer weigh heavily on local patients.
